# delegate

**Instance Property**

The delegate object for the audio session.

## Declaration

```swift
unowned(unsafe) var delegate: (any AVAudioSessionDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The delegate object must implement the protocol described in [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSessionDelegate].

## Responding to audio session changes

- **AVAudioSessionDelegate**: A protocol that defines responses to changes in state for the audio session.

items.description: A protocol that defines responses to changes in state for the audio session.
